answers.text: at the beginning of each parliamentary session

qas.question: How many ministries of the Scottish government does a committee typically correspond to?

answers.text: one (or more) of the departments (or ministries) of the Scottish Government

qas.question: Economy, Energy and Tourism is one of the what?
What is the Scottish Parliament currently in the fourth of?
What are established at the end of each parliamentary session?
Which committees do not reflect the balance of parties across Parliament?
What type of committees exist in the fifth Session?
What committee corresponds with one or more departments in the Spanish Government?

The <a2_0>current <a2_1><a2_2><b6_0>Subject<b6_0/> Committees<a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> in the fourth <a3_0><a3_1><a3_2>Session<a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/> are: Economy, Energy and Tourism; Education and Culture; Health and Sport; Justice; Local Government and Regeneration; Rural Affairs, Climate Change and Environment; Welfare Reform; and Infrastructure and Capital Investment.
